attributes.action: enter the World Beard Growing Championship by growing facial hair to the extent, and with the endeavour as to warrant serious contention for the World Title.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The biennial World Beard and Moustache Championships will be taking place this year in Brighton, England, on September 1, 2007.

We are forming a team of willing competitors to compete against the likes of 'Beard Team USA', and notible main land European counterparts.

We believe the Prime Minister should join and grow a facial appendage with the same vigour and endeavour which he applies to leading the United Kingdom on a daily basis.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
